column4: The Adobe CS Suite is available through WINE, check out -> http://appdb.winehq.org/objectManager.php?sClass=application&iId=17
- thx for the link will look into it
Quick followup, depending on which apps you want, for example Photoshop, has a native Ubuntu alternative GIMP, or somewhat stripped down user friendly Kolour
